header.heading: A Night Under the Stars
header.description: Join us on November 15, 2019, at the Berkeley Church for the inaugural Night Under the Stars Gala that will bring out the glitz for a sparkly soiree in support of Make-A-Wish Canada. We will brighten the night while making wishes come true for children living with critical illnesses.

links.title: Buy Tickets
links.description: Join us for an evening of food, live music, dancing and drinks, all while making dreams come true!

links.title: Sponsor the Event
links.description: Have a direct and transformative impact on the lives of children and strategically align your company with one of Canadaâ€™s most respected and trusted charitable brands.

links.title: Donate
links.description: Consider a monetary to in-kind donation to impact Impact the lives of local children in the Great Toronto Area.
